entries.title: Richard Madeley reveals his daughter Chloe is jetting off on holiday with her estranged husband James Haskell as he describes their split as 'a very happy uncoupling'
entries.summary: The couple - who share two-year-old Bodhi together - confirmed they had split in a joint statement released in October last year, after tying the knot in 2018.
